entry.tran: （尤指商店橱窗中用以展示服装的）人体模型
entry.def: A  mannequin is a life-sized model of a person which is used to display clothes, especially in shop windows.
A mannequin is a person who displays clothes, hats, or shoes by wearing them, especially in fashion shows or in fashion photographs.

means.word_mean: 1. a woman who wears clothes to display fashions;

sentences.sentence: "she was too fat to be a mannequin"

means.word_mean: 2. a life-size dummy used to display clothes
